title: Using genetics of human fat cells to predict response to anti-diabetes drugs

title_detail.value: Using genetics of human fat cells to predict response to anti-diabetes drugs

summary: Researchers have demonstrated -- using fat cells derived from human stem cells -- that individual genetic variation can be used to predict whether the TZD rosiglitazone will produce the unwanted side effect of increasing cholesterol levels in certain individuals.

summary_detail.value: Researchers have demonstrated -- using fat cells derived from human stem cells -- that individual genetic variation can be used to predict whether the TZD rosiglitazone will produce the unwanted side effect of increasing cholesterol levels in certain individuals.
